MSR.Q: In the heatmap, what are the row and column labels for all cells whose heat values fall within the range of 0.34 to 0.64?
MSR.A: The cells are: {(Exploration, Consumption), (Gas, Consumption), (Exploration, Efficiency), (Gas, Efficiency), (Nuclear, Efficiency), (Exploration, Infrastructure), (Gas, Infrastructure), (Nuclear, Infrastructure), (Exploration, Investment), (Gas, Investment), (Exploration, Policy), (Gas, Policy), (Nuclear, Policy), (Exploration, Prices), (Gas, Prices), (Nuclear, Prices), (Exploration, Production), (Gas, Production), (Exploration, Technology), (Gas, Technology), (Nuclear, Technology)}.
